text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/qrespleicestercoughquestionnairelcqschema#1.5.1
leicester_cough_session_idSession ID0..1string
leicester_cough_started_atQuestionnaire Started At0..1string
leicester_cough_completed_atQuestionnaire Completed At0..1string
leicester_cough_durationQuestionnaire Duration (seconds)0..1string
lcq_chest_stomach_painsIn the last 2 weeks, have you had chest or stomach pains as a result of your cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_sputum_phlegmIn the last 2 weeks, have you been bothered by sputum (phlegm) production when you cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_tiredIn the last 2 weeks, have you been tired because of your cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_embarrassedHow often during the last 2 weeks have you felt embarrassed by your coughing?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_anxiousIn the last 2 weeks, my cough has made me feel anxious.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_interfere_jobIn the last 2 weeks, my cough has interfered with my job or other daily tasks.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_interfere_lifeIn the last 2 weeks, I felt that my cough interfered with the overall enjoyment of my life.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_exposure_paintIn the last 2 weeks, exposure to paint or fumes has made me cough.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_sleepIn the last 2 weeks, has your cough disturbed your sleep?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_boutIn the last 2 weeks, how many times a day have you had a coughing bout?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_frustratedIn the last 2 weeks, my cough has made me feel frustrated.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_fed_upIn the last 2 weeks, my cough has made me feel fed up.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_hoarse_voiceIn the last 2 weeks, have you suffered from a hoarse voice as a result of your cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_serious_illnessIn the last 2 weeks, have you worried that your cough may indicate serious illness?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_other_peopleIn the last 2 weeks, have you been concerned that other people think something is wrong with you, because of your cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_interrupt_conversationIn the last 2 weeks, my cough has interrupted conversation or telephone calls.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_partnerIn the last 2 weeks, I feel that my cough has annoyed my partner, family, or friends.0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_felt_in_controlIn the last 2 weeks, have you felt in control of your cough?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
lcq_energyIn the last 2 weeks, have you had a lot of energy?0..1choiceOptions: 7 options

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for lcq_chest_stomach_pains

  • None of the time
  • Hardly any of the time
  • A little of the time
  • Some of the time
  • A good bit of the time
  • Most of the time
  • All of the time
